itunes:title: #152: When You Like Someone as a Love Addict
title: #152: When You Like Someone as a Love Addict
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
description:
What does it look like to be balanced and still available after you've been working on your love addiction symptoms.


In this episode, I share 3 tips for those who are starting this journey building relationships in a different way.
